author: Lucy Craymer
title: Sailors Start to Leave Coronavirus-Stricken U.S. Aircraft Carrier - The Wall Street Journal
description: Sailors Start to Leave Coronavirus-Stricken U.S. Aircraft Carrier The Wall Street Journal Commander of aircraft carrier hit by coronavirus removed for 'poor judgment' after sounding alarm CNN USS Theodore Roosevelt commanding officer relieved of duty, acting …
content:
Some crew members of a coronavirus-stricken American aircraft carrier have been moved to hotels in the U.S. territory of Guam, where they will be quarantined for 14 days, a military official said Friday.
At least 114 of the roughly 5,000 sailors on the USS T… [+237 chars]
